医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
AARDEX 集团：CancerX 计划的创始成员推动创新并改善癌症患者的随访依从性专家 AARDEX Group 自豪地宣布，它是 CancerX 计划的创始成员，该计划汇集了不同的利益相关者来推动创新并改善癌症患者的随访。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/AARDEX-Group-Founding-member-of-the-CancerX-initiative-drives-innovation-and-improves-follow-up-for-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/AARDEX-Group-Founding-member-of-the-CancerX-initiative-drives-innovation-and-improves-follow-up-for-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4ac70b3-6e08-4cf5-b7c1-4cd332d1beef Mon, 24 Jul 2023 04:10:00 -0400 AARDEX Group: Founding member of the CancerX initiative drives innovation and improves follow up for cancer patients
痴呆症风险与邻里劣势之间是否存在关联？研究人员确定了面积剥夺指数（ADI）五分位与阿尔茨海默病及相关痴呆（ADRD）发病率之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Is-there-an-association- Between-dementia-risk-and-neighborhood-disadvantage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Is-there-an-association- Between-dementia-risk-and-neighborhood-disadvantage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70b9d759-6e8e-4a92-80d6-80aa8da0c1b3 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 04:03:00 -0400 Is there an association between dementia risk and neighborhood disadvantage?
压力传感器的突破性发现揭示了抗菌素耐药性的新机制新加坡麻省理工学院研究与技术联盟 (SMART) 抗菌素耐药性 (AMR) 跨学科研究小组 (IRG) 的研究人员与新加坡环境生命科学工程中心 (SCELSE)、新加坡南洋理工大学 (NTU Singapore) 和麻省理工学院 (MIT) 合作，发现了一种新的应激信号系统，使细菌细胞能够适应并保护自己免受免疫系统和某些抗生素的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Breakthrough-stress-sensor-discovery-reveals-new-mechanism-of-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Breakthrough-stress-sensor-discovery-reveals-new-mechanism-of-antimicrobial-resistance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2c048ba-08fd-4fed-9eca-9bf5e3cb5e37 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 03:44:00 -0400 Breakthrough stress sensor discovery reveals new mechanism of antimicrobial resistance
新的生物标志物可以帮助识别侵袭性前列腺癌南澳大学的研究人员发现了三种新的前列腺癌生物标志物，以帮助识别和区分这种疾病的潜在侵袭性病例，这种疾病每年导致超过 300,000 名男性死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-biomarkers-could-help-identify-aggressive-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-biomarkers-could-help-identify-aggressive-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=876cec91-b619-47c2-9221-1021d1b5fdae Mon, 24 Jul 2023 03:29:00 -0400 New biomarkers could help identify aggressive prostate cancer
将慢性肾病患者排除在心血管试验之外留下了显着的证据空白研究着眼于过去二十年中如何以及在何处将 CKD 患者排除在 CVD 随机对照试验之外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Exclusion-of-chronic-kidney-disease- Patients-from-cardiosculptures-leaves-significant-evidence-gaps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/Exclusion-of-chronic-kidney-disease- Patients-from-cardiosculptures-leaves-significant-evidence-gaps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37a55982-fb8b-4863-81c2-161e914a90fb Mon, 24 Jul 2023 03:26:00 -0400 Exclusion of chronic kidney disease patients from cardiovascular trials leaves significant evidence gaps
研究发现新型降胆固醇药物可以影响肺功能和大脑大小世界上最大的一项关于降胆固醇药物影响的研究强调了一种可能损害某些患者肺功能的新型药物的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-class-of-cholesterol-lowering-drugs-can-affect-lung-function-and-brain-size-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-class-of-cholesterol-lowering-drugs-can-affect-lung-function-and-brain-size-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1fd68d7-bb6d-43bf-9ea0-4d771611d271 Mon, 24 Jul 2023 03:25:00 -0400 New class of cholesterol-lowering drugs can affect lung function and brain size, study finds
新的 INTREPID 联盟旨在加快针对未来流行病的抗病毒药物的开发七家创新制药公司成立了 INTREPID 联盟，目标是加快发现和开发针对未来流行病的新型抗病毒疗法的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-INTREPID-Alliance-aims-to-speed-up-development-of-antivirals-for-future-pandemics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230724/New-INTREPID-Alliance-aims-to-speed-up-development-of-antivirals-for-future-pandemics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52b61119-e23f-4f43-a47d-75cd7ae56b4d Mon, 24 Jul 2023 03:16:00 -0400 New INTREPID Alliance aims to speed up development of antivirals for future pandemics
研究发现英国大多数美容从业者都不是合格的医生伦敦大学学院研究人员对英国美容注射行业的分析显示，注射肉毒杆菌等注射剂的美容从业者中，68%不是合格的医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Majority-of-cosmetic-practitioners-in-the-UK-are-not-qualified-medical-doctors-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Majority-of-cosmetic-practitioners-in-the-UK-are-not-qualified-medical-doctors-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20caad0c-97f6-4b7a-81a3-887e653df347 Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:29:34 -0400 Majority of cosmetic practitioners in the UK are not qualified medical doctors, study finds
病毒载量检测不到的艾滋病毒阳性者对性伴侣的风险“几乎为零”根据《柳叶刀》发表的一项分析，艾滋病毒感染者如果病毒水平保持在较低水平但仍可检测到，并坚持抗逆转录病毒疗法，那么将病毒传染给性伴侣的风险几乎为零。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/HIV-positive-people-with-unDetectable-viral-load-pose-e28098almost-zeroe28099-risk-to- Sex-partners.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/HIV-positive-people-with-unDetectable-viral-load-pose-e28098almost-zeroe28099-risk-to- Sex-partners.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd71bb60-c8fc-4b32-80e4-161d04f0232c Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:20:55 -0400 HIV-positive people with undetectable viral load pose ‘almost zero’ risk to sexual partners
益生元含量最高的前 5 种食物越来越多的证据表明，食用益生元——；植物中常见的某些类型的纤维可以刺激肠道中的有益细菌；可以帮助维持健康的肠道微生物组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Top-5-foods-with-the-highest-prebiotic-content.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230723/Top-5-foods-with-the-highest-prebiotic-content.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6678e3c4-3d27-441a-887e-09210a3ede3b Sun, 23 Jul 2023 20:20:00 -0400 Top 5 foods with the highest prebiotic content
